author: gseitz
msg: no more floating for month- and year selection input elements (which caused a linebreak after the month selection if calendar was too narrow)

author: jaz
msg: implemented feature to allow setting default values for survey questions; response can be generated by setting v
alues (via a map) in the wrapper before rendering
implemented GEO and ENUMERATION types for Survey Questions; now ANY Geo Group or Enumeration Type can be listed

author: psteitz
msg: * Made LIFO/FIFO behavior configurable for GenericObjectPool and
GenericKeyedObjectPool, with default set back to LIFO
* Fixed GOP, GKOP evict method and added tests to ensure objects
* Changed backing store for GOP, GKOP pools back to Commons Collections
